nodes.text: Ton-Falk was a planet located within the Ton-Falk system of the Outer Rim Territories.

During the Galactic Civil War, the Battle of Ton-Falk took place near the planet. During this battle, the Empire lost two frigates and a Dreadnaught-class heavy cruiser to the Rebel Alliance's Renegade Flight, leading to the development of the Ton-Falk-class escort carrier.
